text: Fahim Ajani or Raju Shrestha [born 15 August 1966], initially credited as Master Raju or Master Rajoo, is an Indian film and television actor, who started his film career as a child actor, in the 1970s. Raju has acted in films like Gulzar's Parichay, Hrishikesh Mukherjee's Bawarchi (1972), Yash Chopra's Daag: A Poem of Love (1973), Basu Chatterjee's Chitchor (1976) and Gulzar's Kitaab (1977). == References == == Other websites == * http://www.rediff.com/movies/slide-show/slide-show-1-going-back-in-time-with- master-raju/20140724.htm * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Indian actors
title: Raju Shrestha
